CHAT.comment: ALBERT SNYDER, Petitioner v. FRED W. PHELPS, SR., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SEAN E. SUMMERS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARGIE J. PHELPS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SEAN E. SUMMERS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
